Start 起步 #

Installation安装 #

npm install @mpanda/mpc -S

cnpm install @mpanda/mpc -S

yarn add @mpanda/mpc -S

Usage使用 #

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import MPC from '@mpanda/mpc' 
import '@mpanda/mpc/lib/mpc.css'
import App from './App.vue'
const Vue = createApp(App)
Vue.use(MPC)
Vue.mount('#app')
